summary: level 1 character inspired by Olivia Wilde
descriptionHtml:
If you are interested in a stand alone follower of this with an updated look [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26056]Click Here![/url]



Heres my attempt to make an Olivia Wilde look-a-like. Please comment and endorse if you would like me to continue making these characters, thanks!

Update: Added a mod that changes lydia to olivia, eventually ill make her a new npc that can be a follower. Still need to install the required mods to match the pics, tell me if it works alright!

1.1 fixes tintmasks now includes a .bsa file. Make sure both the esp and bsa are in data folder 


Save is level 1 after dragon attack and her race is Imperial


Required Mods: Make sure to download the file I specify
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Better Females by Bella: No makeup just improved textures[/url]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=140]Amazing Smooth Females Complete: 2- Ultra Smooth Females Deluxe [/url] 
Only really need the imperial woman normal map from this one



Note: Her appearance changes a lot with outdoor lighting and loses resemblance.






[center]If you liked this check out my other characters[/center]
[center][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1131]Khal Drogo[/url] /  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1012]Jaime Lannister[/url] /  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=972]Eddard Stark[/url] /  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1520]Daenerys Targaryen[/url] /  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2157]Spartacus[/url] / [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5964]Megan Fox[/url] / [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6036]Thor[/url][/center]
author: Twinpanic
